law.catch_line: Managerial Accountability and Performance, authority to make certain intradepartmental budget amendments, proscription on allowing departmental expenditures for any line item to exceed appropriations therefor, notification of possible deficiency and quarterly reporting required.

text.section: Sec. 2-1796. Managerial Accountability and Performance, authority to make certain intradepartmental budget amendments, proscription on allowing departmental expenditures for any line item to exceed appropriations therefor, notification of possible deficiency and quarterly reporting required.
